title: Overnight Savory Breakfast Mushrooms
directions: Add all of the ingredients to a bowl and mix together until it is evenly coated and mixed together.
Cover bowl and place in refrigerator for at least one hour, or overnight.
Serve your breakfast mushrooms with toast, baked sweet potato, pancakes, savory french toast etc
ingredients: 1/4 cup Fresh Parsley chopped (or herbs of choice)
1/4 tsp Chilli Flakes optional, or to taste
1/8 tsp White Pepper optional, or to taste
pinch coarse celtic sea salt optional, or to taste
